mapper.select: SELECT @rowNum:=@rowNum - 1 as rowNum, boardIdx, title, name, password, contents, regDate FROM board, (SELECT @rowNum:=#{totalCount} - #{startNum} + 1) a ORDER BY boardIdx DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{listCount};

SELECT @rowNum:=@rowNum - 1 as rowNum, boardIdx, title, name, password, contents, regDate FROM board, (SELECT @rowNum:=#{pageInfoMap.totalCount} - #{pageInfoMap.startNum} + 1) a WHERE ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY boardIdx DESC LIMIT #{pageInfoMap.startNum}, #{pageInfoMap.listCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT boardIdx, title, name, password, contents, regDate FROM board WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardIdx, title, name, password, contents, regDate) VALUE (0, #{title}, #{name}, #{password}, #{contents}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, contents = #{contents} WHERE boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
